coldDescriptions: Why did the snowman call his dog Frost? Because Frost bites!
The cold weather turned me into an ice-cream enthusiast - I'm a 'cones-noisseur' now!
Why don't you ever see elephants hiding in trees? Because they're so good at 'chilling' in the snow!
What do you call a snowman with a six-pack? An abdominal snowman!
Why did the man put his money in the freezer? He wanted cold hard cash!
I tried to make a joke about cold weather, but it's snow joke!
What do you call a snowman party? A snowball!
Why did the snowman bring a broom to the party? To 'sweep' the ladies off their feet!
The cold weather's got me feeling like an ice cube - just chilling!
What did one snowman say to the other? 'Do you smell carrots?'
